title: Digital Technology-Enhanced Hansen’s Disease Education Capacity-Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Medical and Public Health Concepts
context.additional_context: Hansen’s disease educational professional development program combining smartphone-based digital platforms with offline workshops

learning_goals: Explain the epidemiology, transmission routes, and diagnostic criteria of Hansen’s disease
Conduct a project analyzing Hansen’s disease management cases using digital simulation tools
Develop the ability to produce educational content incorporating peer feedback on smartphone-based collaborative platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
